content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Mar 2019What are leading, lagging and coincident indicators? What are they for?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leonard TanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Mar 2019Basically these 3 types of indicators monitor economic performance, albeit with different time delays. Leading indicators are usually ahead of the economy, coincident- somewhat concurrent with economy, and lagging- slightly behind economy. 0 comments0
